ing: 1/2 (10 ounce) jar Dickinson'sÂ® Pure Marion Blackberry Preserves or any berry flavor Dickinson'sÂ® Preserves or Purely FruitÂ® Spreadable Fruit
des: "Whip up a batch of creamy, fruity lemon berry dessert sauce in minutes to serve over cakes, fill little pastries, or swirl onto desserts for an elegant and flavorful presentation."
ins:
Puree all ingredients together in blender. Serve immediately.
Serve over your favorite angel food, pound or cheese cake. Fill plain or chocolate pastry cups. Pour sauce into a squeeze bottle to swirl on dessert plates or over desserts for an elegant presentation.
